product highlights

product_name: Top Paw® Super Deodorizing Dog Spray
product_description:
product highlights

This deodorizing spray is formulated to eliminate pet odors on contact. Use the spray between baths and on bedding between washes to keep your pet smelling fresh. A PetSmart exclusive. This Top Paw Super Deodorizing Spray keeps your pet smelling fresh between baths and freshens your pet's bedding between washes. Featuring Shed Repel™ and Odor Control™ technologies, the spray helps eliminate odors on contact and releases loose coat for a cleaner home. The spray is pH balanced for your dog's skin.
  • For use on dogs 8 weeks of age and older and their bedding and environment
  • Eliminates pet odors on contact
  • For use on pets, spray lightly, carefully avoiding pet's eyes and face and massage into coat
  • For bedding and fabrics, hold bottle 8" to 12" from surface to be treated; spray evenly until slightly damp; odors fade as item dries; repeat as needed for stubborn odors; test for color fastness on small area of fabric prior to use; safe for frequent use
  • Odor Control technology encapsulates and eliminates odors at the molecular level
  • Shed Repel technology helps release loose coat, reduces static, makes cleanup easier, makes fur less likely to stick on clothing, furniture and carpet and helps to reduce allergens in the home
  • pH balanced for your dog's skin
  • Paraben- and cruelty-free

product_description:
product highlights

Features: Ideal for regular nail maintenance
Includes: (1) Nail Clipper
Intended for: Dogs
Health Consideration: Nail
Instructions: Find a quiet place and make your dog feel comfortable. Hold your dog's foot and use your thumb to gently press the base of the nail to extend it slightly. Trim the nail at a 45-degree angle so it is flush with the floor when your dog walks. Be cautious of the blood vessel, or quick (pink in color), in each nail, and trim only the nail tip. The quick may be difficult to see in dark nails. Avoid cutting nails too short as bleeding may occur. If you cut the quick, applya coagulant to help stop the bleeding. It is recommended that you trim your pet's nails every 4-6 weeks.

Caution: This is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children. For use on dogs only.

Before grinding a dog's nails:
1. Familiarize your dog with having his paws handled before showing him the grinder. Manipulate his paws for a few minutes while giving him positive reinforcement.
2. Let him sniff the nail grinder while it is turned off.
3. Turn the grinder on so he can get used to the sound it makes. Have him sit while the tool is in your hand and running.
4. Once he is accustomed to the tool, try touching it to his nails. Do not do any actual grinding yet.
5. Repeat the above steps as necessary until dog is comfortable.

product_description:
product highlights

Trim your dog's nails the safe and easy way with the Top Paw Safety Nail Clipper. The trick to nail clipping is to clip the sharp tip off the nail without cutting into the quick, which is the part inside the nail where the blood vessels and nerve endings are located. If you clip the quick the nail will bleed, and it will be uncomfortable for your pet. This amazing clipper features a QuickSensor that detects the quick so that youâll never cut into it.

    1. Power on the Top Paw Quickfinder Safety Nail Clipper

Directions:
Hold your pet's foot and gently push down with your thumb at the base of the nail. This will cause the nail to extend slightly, making it easier for you to see the nail. Trim the nail at a 45-degree angle so that the newly cut nail is flush with the floor when you pet walks. There is a blood vessel, in each nail, called the quick. Do not cut the nail so short that you cut the quick. Always cut just the excess nail. The pinkish color of the quick is easy to see in pets with light-colored nails. However, it is almost impossible to see on dogs with dark nails. To avoid cutting the quick, locate it from the underside of each nail before you begin cutting. Cut each nail back just a little at a time until you get close, but not right up to the quick. If you do inadvertently cut the quick, apply pressure to stop bleeding. Use a nail file immediately after trimming your dog's nails to remove any rough edges.

product_description:
product highlights

Take advantage of a dog shampoo that kills fleas and ticks on contact. Bayer Advantage Dog Shampoo rids your furry friend of unwanted pest. Prevent, treat, control.

Health Consideration: Prevention for ticks and fleas
Features: Comfort for the one you love
Life Stage: Dogs 12 weeks and older
Package Quantity: 24 oz
Application: Shampoo
Caution: Harmful if swallowed. Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash hands thoroughly with soap and warm water after handling. Keep out of reach of children. Do not contaminate feed or food.

Directions:
It is a violation of Federal Law to use this product in a manner inconsistent with its labeling. READ ENTIRE LABEL BEFORE EACH USE. USE ONLY ON DOGS. Follow all precautions and directions. For use on Dogs over the age of 12 weeks for control of Fleas and Ticks. Do not repeat treatment for 7 days. Do not use on puppies under 12 weeks. Consult a veterinarian before using this product on debilitated, aged, pregnant, or nursing animals. Sensitivities may occur using any pesticide product for pets. If signs of sensitivity occur, bathe your pet with mild soap and rinse with large amounts of water. If signs continue, consult a veterinarian immediately.

How to Use:
Wet the animalâs coat for 2-3 minutes with warm water. Apply shampoo on head and ears and lather. Then repeat procedure with neck, chest, and middle and hindquarters, finishing legs last and paying special attention to the footpads (between the toes) and underbody areas. Wash the head and ear areas carefully, making sure to keep the shampoo out of the animalâs eyes. NOTE: A drop of glycerin in each eye before bathing may prevent or reduce irritation if the shampoo gets in the animalâs eyes. Pay special attention to the base of the tail, as it is a place frequented by fleas. Fully lather animal and let lather remain on animal for 5 minutes before rinsing thoroughly with water. NOTE: This fi nal step is an important part of grooming procedure. For small dogs less than 15 pounds, wrapping the animal in a towel for several minutes to absorb moisture is advised. This also will allow dying fleas and ticks to crawl off animal into the towel before drying animal with a towel or blow dryer. Flea and tick control on the animal is only part of the solution to the problem. The inside of the house and the outdoor area used by the animal must also be treated for complete control.

Hazards to Humans and Domestic Animals:
Causes substantial but temporary eye injury. Causes skin irritation. Do not get in eyes, on skin, or clothing. Harmful if inhaled. Avoid breathing product vapor. If available, wear protective eyewear such as goggles or safety glasses. Wear gloves made out of any waterproof material. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco, or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse. Combustible. Do not use or store near heat or open flame.

First Aid:
IF IN EYES: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the fi rst 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eyes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.

IF ON SKIN OR CLOTHING: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.

IF INHALED: Move person to fresh air. If person is not breathing, call 911 or an ambulance. Then give artificial respiration, preferably mouth-to-mouth if possible. Call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice. Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor or going for treatment. For information regarding medical emergencies or pesticide incidents, call 1-888-740-8712.

Storage and Disposal:
Do not contaminate water, food, or feed by storage and disposal. Pesticide Storage Store in a cool, dry area. Always store pesticides in the original container. Store away from food and pet food. Pesticide Disposal and Container Handling Nonrefillable container. Do not reuse or refill this container. If empty: Place in trash or offer for recycling if available. If partly filled: Call your local solid waste agency for disposal instructions. Never place unused product down any indoor or outdoor drain.

Active Ingredients:
Pyrethrins
Piperonyl butoxide, Technical
N-Octyl bicycloheptene dicarboximide
Equivalent to 0.240% (butylcarbityl) (6-propylpiperonyl)

product highlights

Features: Kills fleas and ticks for up to 10 days; Cleans and deodorizes
Intended For: Dogs and Puppies
Includes: (1) 16 fl oz Bottle
Health Consideration: Flea & Tick

Cautions:
Hazards to Humans: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes, skin, or clothing. Prolonged or frequently repeated skin contact may cause allergic reactions in some individuals. Wear protective rubber gloves when applying this product. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove contaminated clothing before reuse. Apply this product only as specified on this label.
Hazards to Domestic Animals: Do not treat (use on) dogs less than 12 weeks of age. Consult a veterinarian before applying this product on medicated, debilitated, aged, pregnant, or nursing animals. Sensitivities may occur after using any pesticide product for pets. If signs of sensitivity occur, bathe your pet with mild soap and rinse with large amounts of water. If signs continue, consult a veterinarian immediately.

Directions: Wet dog's coat thoroughly. Pour this product into the cup of your hand. Starting at the head and working back, work up a lather with this quick lathering formula, being sure that the lather is worked thoroughly into dog's coat down to the skin. Allow lather to stand five minutes, then rinse completely and towel dry. It should not be necessary to repeat the shampoo application unless the animal is excessively dirty.

    Cautions: It is a violation of Federal law to use this product in a manner inconsistent with its labeling. Do not apply to dogs and puppies less than 12 weeks old. This product is indended for indoor use only. Application is prohibited directly into sewers or drains, or to any area like a gutter where drainage to sewers, storm drains, water bodies, or aquatic habitat can occur Do not all the product to enter any drain during or after application. Consult a veterinarian before applying this product on medicated, debilitated, aged, pregnant or nursing animals. Avoid contact with eyes, skin or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Wear protective rubber gloves when applying this product.

Starting at the head and working back, work up a lather with this quick lathering formula, being sure that the lather is worked thoroughly into dog's coat down to the skin. Allow lather to stand five minutes, then rinse completely and towel dry. It should not be necessary to repeat the shampoo application unless the animal is excessively dirty. Reapply every 30 days as needed.

product_name: Top Paw® Toy Dog Breed Nail Clipper
product_description:
product highlights

Maintaining a regular grooming routine helps keep your dog happy and healthy. The Top Paw Toy Breed Nail Clippers are designed with a nail guard to help minimize over cutting when trimming your dog's nails. Only at PetSmart.

Features: Ideal for regular nail maintenance; perfect for toy breeds
Includes: 1 - Toy Breed Nail Scissors
Intended For: Dogs
Health Consideration: Nails
Caution: This is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children. For use on dogs only.

Directions:
Find a quiet place and make your dog feel comfortable. Hold your dog's foot and use your thumb to gently press the base of the nail to extend it slightly. Trim the nail at a 45-degree angle so it is flush with the floor when your dog walks. Be cautious of the blood vessel, or quick (pink in color), in each nail and trim only the nail tip. The quick may be difficult to see in dark nails. Avoid cutting nails too short as bleeding may occur. If youcut the quick, apply a coagulant to help stop the bleeding. It is recommended that you trim your pet's nails every 4-6 weeks.

Ergonomic design, light weight housing, and rubber grip sides for ease of use. The grooming experts.

Used For: Dogs (all breeds)

  • Instructional Step-by-Step DVD
  • Cleaning Brush & Oil
  • Blade Guard
  • Replacement Drive Tip
    Health Consideration: Grooming; skin and coat
    Use Instructions: See instruction manual included.

    Caution: This is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children and pets. For use on dogs only.

    7 Useful Tips:
    1. Properly prepare the coat before clipping bathe, dry and brush the coat removing any mats.
    2. Use guide combs (sold separately) to leave the coat longer than when using the blade alone.
    3. Have the dog stand on a towel or drop cloth they will feel more secure and clean up is easier.
    4. Examine the skin for any cuts, lumps or sores and avoid these sensitive areas.
    5. Pull the skin tight to avoid cutting into skin folds or loosely hanging fur.
    6. Praise and reassure your dog frequently and take plenty of breaks.
    7. Step up in clipper performance as you becomes comfortable with the clipping process.

Water, Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Diazolidinyl Urea, Disodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadnesis Leaf Juice, Polysorbate 20, Sodium Hydroxide, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance

product_description:
product highlights

    Product Dimensions: 6.5 x 2 x 8.75
    Use: De-shedding
    Directions:
    To deShed your pet, first perform a complete physical inspection of its skin and coat. If there are any sores, bruises or skin conditions, seek treatment from a veterinarian. Next, remove any tangles or mats with a brush or comb. Take a deShedding Tool and gently stroke through your pet's coat, working from the base of the neck to the tail. Treat once or twice each week for 10 to 20 minutes, or more often if necessary.

product_name: FURminator® FURflex™ Slicker Head
product_description:
product highlights

The FURminator FURflex Slicker Head for Dogs is ideal for removing loose topcoat hair, tangles and debris while massaging the pet's skin. This tool features straight bristles on one size and bent bristles on the other side. The dual flex head design follows the natural contours of your dog's body, while keeping the bristles in their ideal working position.

Features:

  • Straight bristles on one side, bent bristles on the other
  • Dual flex head design
  • Connect to the ergonomic handle for secure and comfortable grip and let the tool get to work. Handle sold separately.

    Includes: 1 Tool Head
    Intended Pet(s): Dogs
    Product Dimensions: 4.5 in x 2 in x 7.5 in
    Directions:
    1. To brush your pet, find a calm time and location to sit down with your pet for grooming. Gently stroke across the pet's coat in the direction of hair growth. Start from your pet's head and work your way back, using extra care near stomach, legs, genitals and anus. Avoid making excessive strokes in a single area, as this may cause irritation of your pet's fur and skin. Brush until all debris is removed from the pet's fur, tangles are removed, and all areas of fur have been brushed.

    2. Grooming is a good time to perform a complete physical inspection of your pet. As you brush your pet, look for sores, bruises and skin conditions, which your pet's coat may conceal. If your pet has any of these conditions, seek treatment from a veterinarian before resuming brushing.

product highlights

The shaped lines follow your pet's contour for maximum impact. Connect tool head to the ergonomic handle and let the tool get to work. The Finishing Comb is for use on long, curly, silky or wiry coats, and is great in households with multiple pets. Add the finishing comb into your at home grooming routine and see professional quality results right from the comfort of your home.

Features: Rotating rounded stainless steel pins
Includes: 1 Tool Head
Intended Pet(s): Dogs, Cats
Product Dimensions: 4.75 in x 2 in x 7.25 in
Directions:
The FURminator Comfort Edge deShedding Tool is recommended for use on shedding breeds. Consult your veterinarian if you are unsure if your pet has an undercoat. Brushing is the first step to good grooming. A high-quality brush helps remove debris and loose hair and break up tangles. After brushing, small pin mats and tangles often remain and are easily removed with a comb. For best results, start with a brush and finish with a comb. Your dog's coat type will determine the style of comb you should purchase. For all dogs with long, curly, silky or wiry coats.

product_name: Top Paw® By Conair® Pet Shedding Blade
product_description:
product highlights

Features: Helps reduce shedding and eliminates excess water after bathing; May be used looped or extended
Includes: 1 Blade
Intended Pet(s): Dog
Product Dimensions: 2.75 in x 1.25 in x 10 in
Directions:
Find a quiet place and make your dog feel comfortable. Work in the direction of hair growth. When looped (handles together), work from head to tail, stroking small areas at a time. When extended (handles separated), work from the head to the tail, stroking large areas at a time. Use smooth even strokes while applying light pressure. Pay extra attention to the legs and underbelly where loose hair tends to accumulate. To help remove loosened hair, use a Top Paw by Conair brush or comb.

Caution: This is not a toy. Keep out of reach of children. For use on dogs only.

product_name: FURminator® FURflex™ Reversible Mat Breaker Tool Head
product_description:
product highlights

The FURminator FURflex Reversible Mat Breaker Tool Head quickly and easily removes hair mats. Regardless of hair type, always use on a dry pet so mats are loose. Use this Mat Breaker on all pets with all hair types. The reversible blades allow for both right and left-handed use. Securely attach to the FURflex handle and let the tool get to work.

Features: Reversible blade for right-handed or left-handed use

Includes: 1 Tool Head
Intended Pet(s): Dogs, Cats
Product Dimensions: 4.75 in x 2 in x 6 in
Directions:
1. To groom your pet, find a calm time and location to sit down with your pet. Gently stroke across the pet's coat in the direction of hair growth. Start from your pet's head and work your way back, using extra care near stomach, legs, genitals and anus. Avoid making excessive strokes in a single area, as this may cause irritation of your pet's fur and skin. Brush until all tangles and debris are removed from the pet's fur.

2. Grooming is a good time to perform a complete physical inspection of your pet. As you brush your pet, look for sores, bruises and skin conditions, which your pet's coat may conceal. If your pet has any of these conditions, seek treatment from a veterinarian before resuming brushing. 5280402 The FURminator FURflex Handle is ergonomic, providing comfort and ease of use. Quickly and easily de-shed undercoat, groom topcoat and pick up loose hair at the push of a button. FURmLock technology keeps tool heads secure and locked in place. This handle is for use with all FURflex attachments.

Features: FURmLock technology keeps head secure and locked in place

Includes: 1 Handle
Intended Pet(s): Dogs
Product Dimensions: 4.25 in x 2 in x 6.5 in
Directions:
1. To attach a tool head, simply insert into an empty handle and push until the head "clicks" into place. The head should be secure without budging when being used.

2. To remove a tool head, press firmly on the release button. The tool head should easily come out, allowing you to switch to you next tool in seconds. It's that simple!

Assembly is required to attach hoses to collar and rigid air flow ports (3) which are engineered for non-slip guillotine action to control air quantity to each drying cage. Hoses are made of highly flexible, synthetic rubber with metal inner hose support to preclude hose collapse or pinch. The 430MDK is preferred by groomers who desire reliable, versatile multi cage drying jobs. product_name: MetroVac® Master Blaster Variable Speed Pet Dryer
product_description:
product highlights

The Air Force Master Blaster Variable Control Pet Dryer by MetroVac delivers high-performance drying technology that will leave your pets looking their best. It's the perfect tool for all your furry clients, big or small. Powerful when you need it and gentle when you don't.

Features:

  • Two twin fan 4.0 peak HP motors, and DUAL variable controls
  • Works on long and short-haired breeds
  • Infinite control over airspeed allows you to reduce unnecessary noise by up to 90%
  • Made entirely out of steel to provide optimum levels of durability and provide years of trouble free service
  • no heating element, meaning that you can quickly and safely dry pets without the risk of making them uncomfortable or damaging their coats

    Includes:

  • 10 ft. 1.5 in Diameter Heavy Duty Commercial Strength Hose
  • Heavy Duty Neoprene Blower Nozzle
  • Male/male adaptor
  • Air Flare

    Intended Pet(s): Dog, Cat, Small Pet, Large Pet
    Dimensions: 22 in x 8 in x 11 in
    Product Weight: 26 lb
    Directions: The AIR FORCE MASTER BLASTER is designed to cut drying time by as much as 75%. The MASTER BLASTER provides gentle heat and dramatic air velocity to dry Pets quickly and thoroughly.

    1. Insert the grounded Power Supply Cord into a grounded outlet. IMPORTANT: PRODUCT MUST BE GROUNDED. WARNING: INPROPER CONNECTION OF THE EQUIPMENT GROUNDING CONDUCTOR CAN RESULT IN A RISK OF ELECTRIC SHOCK!
    2. Move car/motorcycle to a dry area to eliminate risk of electric shock.
    3. Fit the 10 ft. by 1-1/2 in Hose (D) over the steel tube protruding from the front end cap of the power unit. Tighten the adjustable clamp to keep the hose securely on the dryer.
    4. Start the dryer by pushing the On/Off Switch (B) from left to right. Dry the vehicle from top to bottom.
    5. Attach or remove the Neoprene Nozzle, or other attachments from the hose to control the air velocity.
    6. For even greater air flow, the hose cuff on the blower end screws off in a counter clockwise direction and screws back on in a clockwise direction.

    Caution: Do not drop this machine. Motor malfunction caused by product being dropped is not covered under warranty.

product_name: CHI® Combo Slicker with Detangling Pin Dog Brush
product_description:
product highlights

Make grooming your dog easy with the CHI for Dogs Combo Slicker with Detangling Pin Brush. This tool penetrates the bottom and top coat and simultaneously removes tangles and loose hair. It also helps to reduce both shedding and grooming time. In short, it allows you to take exceptional care of your dog throughout the grooming process.

Features:

  • 2-in-1 detangling pin and slicker brush
  • Ionic technology
  • Ergonomic soft grip handle

    Includes: 1 Combo Slicker
    Intended Pet(s): Dogs
    Material(s): Plastic
    Color: Black, Red, Grey
    Product Dimensions: 8 in x 4 in
    Instructions:
    Stroke coat in the direction of hair growth. Start at the rear of your pet and work your way forward. To prevent pulling of the skin, put your fingers between the brush and the skin. Slowly stroke through the tangles. To assist with mat removals, use our Chi for Dogs Shedding Rake & Blade combo brush and/or Chi for DogsOatmeal Conditioner.

product highlights

Features: Single row of pins
Includes: 1 Grooming Comb
Intended Pet(s): Dogs
Color: Tan, Black
Instructions for Use: Comb in the direction of hair growth. Start at your dog's head and work your way back. Use smooth, even strokes while applying light pressure. Comb the hair before bathing as water may tighten any mats.

Warning: This is not a toy. Contains small parts. Keep out of reach of children and pets. For use with dogs only.

product_description:
product highlights

Remove mats effortlessly with the FURminator FURFLEX Reversible Mat Breaker Head. This amazing tool uses curved, stainless steel blades to remove mats with ease and eliminate the discomfort, pain and irritation they can cause. Furthermore, reversible blades allow for right or left-handed use. Great for long hair and short hair dogs.

Features:

  • Effortlessly removes mats
  • Easily reversible for left or right hand use
  • Curved, stainless steel blades for added safety
  • Great for homes with multiple pets and different grooming or hair collection needs
  • Use as part of your weekly deShedding regimen
  • Quickly, easily de-shed, groom and pick up loose hair
  • Secure FURmLock technology
    Includes: Reversible Mat Breaker
    Intended Pet(s): Dogs, Multi-Pet Homes
    Product Dimensions: 4.5 in x 2.5 in x 5.875 in

    Instructions:     To begin the dematting process, simply adjust the curved blades on the tool to accommodate right- or left-handed usage by pressing the release button on the side of the tool. The button releases the blades, allowing for removal of the blade and reinsertion of the blade cartridge in the opposite direction. Lock the blades securely in place by sliding locking mechanism back in starting position.
